context: libxlio is a high-performance kernel-bypass TCP/IP networking library. It evolved from libvma (Mellanox VMA) and shares its architectural patterns for RDMA-based networking. libxlio embeds a modified lwip TCP/IP stack in src/core/lwip/ for protocol handling. When analyzing this codebase, patterns from libvma inform the networking abstractions and device management, while lwip patterns inform the TCP state machine and protocol implementation.
